Description:
Detects the use of Dumpert process dumper, which dumps the lsass.exe process memory

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HackTool - Dumpert Process Dumper Execution
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where hashes like '%09d278f9de118ef09163c6140255c690%' and command like '%dumpert.dll%'
